title: Businessweek Extra - Frances Frei
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Frances Frei
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring a conversation with Frances Frei, Professor of Technology and Operations Management at Harvard Business School, on being hired by Uber & WeWork to fix their toxic cultures
